summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the making and repayment of a temporary loan of $21,730.00 from the general fund of the City of Seattle to the "Local Improvement Fund, District No. 3201", for the purpose of paying the cost and expense of the improvement of 50th Avenue South, et al by the construction of sewers therein, as provided for in Ordinance No. 39527, of said city.
